replies.body: {{champion:107}} got a new best friend!

He doesn't need a leash and can make bushes. 

I'm a bit scared actually.

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=TG96eGfw,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2016-09-20T18:47:50.613+0000)
>
> He doesn't need a leash and can make bushes. 
> 
> I'm a bit scared actually.

1. No leash
2. Fast clear
3. 100% hp clear and first gank
4. On-demand bushes

Um ... Please Rito, tell me you balanced him somehow ...
Apparently he sacrifices health and mana whenever he frees a camp.
How do you know?
I'm scouring the forums and Reddit, think Meddler said it.

correct, it's in the thred demanding his info be released. 

question is, how much does he sack for this early game?
and does it have a cool down?
does he get gold on freeing a camp?
yes. he gets gold and exp as if he cleared the camp normally.
whats the cd lvl 1? if i am playing sup, can i take krugs/gromp before minions hit the lane?

at lvl 1 it takes 40sec to set it up. 
so I'm going to say no.
set up as in i click it and 40 secs later i take it or like the cooldown
The first one.

correct, 40sec later you can take the camp.  

but, if you smite the camp you take it instantly.  so I guess he can instantly steal the other junglers buff? but they can probably just take yours in the time it takes you to clear...

agreed that taking the buff can be a major setback for the other jungler, but this champ seems to have almost no ability to hold his own in a 1v1 fight for the majority of the game.  

so I just see it extremely likely for him to be invaded and killed in his own jungle a lot buy most of the popular jungle choices
He gets gold and exp
Ar level 1 it takes a grove 40 sec to grow
demanding? what is wrong with those people... squad 5 told you everything you needed to know on twitch.
it was a m&g post demanding his info be released before the guy broke his keyboard refreshing the page over and over again while the release page was down due to a problem
oh. okay. that's m&g posts. they're not serious. i was about to say if someone actually did that they need help. there's a difference between healthy obsession and addiction.

I like that term, "frees".

Next time I jungle I'll just keep in mind I'm not killing then, in freeing them from existence.
I wouldn't call that a "fast clear". Almost any Jungler with 1-2 Items will outspeed him (if this doesn't get faster with higher level).
true, but other junglers can't take a buff and leave another copy for an ally. That's what he gets for a slower clear time. Once he hits lvl 5.

And then they just invade him and repeatedly reset the jungle camp while he tries to do it, since Ivern seems to have no 1v1 potential at least in early, nor does it seem likely he could take jungle monsters otherwise (or at least, by any fast means).
Except he has a better Lee Sin Q and a bigger explosive Sion shield + BUSH !

Considering the delay from his passive, it's a lot of time without access to exp and shit.

If they're able to farmed while he has his grove on them, that means they can be easily stolen late-game, too.
Well you can use smite to instantly clear a camp,which helps to get a level up early on and you can clear multiple camps at once.

Makes sense.

Looks like Insight will become mandatory on him. Maybe even Lucidity, too.
He kinda seems like he does like no damage I think
He's a support jungler
I feel like a clear like that is the only way that would work
POTATOS ARE ALWAYS WATCHING

> [{quoted}](name=Photos of Ghosts,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=TG96eGfw,comment-id=0013,timestamp=2016-09-20T20:54:34.400+0000)
>
> POTATOS ARE ALWAYS WATCHING

You think they have all those eyes for nothing? ;)

YOU
did you work on Mechs vs Minions?

> [{quoted}](name=Photos of Ghosts,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=TG96eGfw,comment-id=001300000000,timestamp=2016-09-20T23:39:27.331+0000)
>
> YOU
> did you work on Mechs vs Minions?

ME?!
No, I didn't.  I got to playtest it over a year ago, but haven't had the pleasure since!  (I'm hoping to buy a copy for my gaming group to play.)  Might be able to volunteer to help with a thing for them for the near future, but nope - I am not part of the awesome team that made it :)
Is there any tabletop system it might be comparable to?  I haven't been able to get a good read on what it is like.

> [{quoted}](name=Baron of Bread,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=TG96eGfw,comment-id=00130000000000000001,timestamp=2016-09-21T04:14:18.729+0000)
>
> Is there any tabletop system it might be comparable to?  I haven't been able to get a good read on what it is like.

If you've played Robo Rally, then imagine that, but crossed with something like Mice and Mystics for the story-missions and the co-op elements.  I.e. it's a 'programming' game but you're trying to work together to achieve whatever the goal is for the particular mission you're on!

There are some pretty good 'how to play' videos out there, if it's all a bit abstract still.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FLtVB6zkvcs

Also, there's a whole [sub-Board devoted to the game](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/mechs-vs-minions) over on the sidepanel there.

Think you guys will ever release a steam version? I love being able to sit at home and play Talisman with buddies that live far away from me, it gives me a reason to keep in touch with them despite busy schedules on both ends

Premade power Activate!

Form of {{champion:107}} {{champion:76}} getting camped by allied Ivern!

Seriously though he looks fun but this guy is going to completely destroy things if he's got voice chat with one of these champs.
Not sure, but I think bushes work for enemies too

I love how Riot continues to create unique kits for new champions. Their ideas are limitless, it's a wonderful thing. I have to say though...if I run into Ivern on the Rift, I might have a mini heart attack. His strut is something out of a horror movie, and that golum-like creature reminds me of Tibbers, which reminds me of death...RIP Junglers.
I was wondering how he would work...being a friend of the jg and all. That's awesome!
Seems underpowered
hey guys, remember plant king?! :D
I'm honestly incredibly excited because Ivern is shaping up to be the first champion that actually "breaks" in-game set rules. Junglers need to kill things/take Smite? Nah.
Looks like he needs to channel. It would be tough for him to contest objectives in combat without smite.
Not to mention how would he control objectives like dragon and baron without smite? I doubt he can channel and "free" Dragon and baron. He probably still needs smite.
Has to fight them. He says "dragons and void creatures don't like me :c"
the first smiteless jungler?

He looks strong af.

BUT HES SO COOL AND HE IS ACTUALLY FRIENDLY TO THE JUNGLE 'MONSTERS' I LOVE HIM SO MUCH!
